Tokenomics Rules

A total of 17,999,000 Aidag tokens are held in the SoulwareAI + DAO wallet. These tokens are autonomously used for presale, bonus, liquidity, and staking.

  • 40% of presale revenue goes to the liquidity pool.
  • 60% of presale revenue goes to the founder wallet.

Transparency

All rules are verified in smart contracts and visible on the block explorer. DAO members can confirm autonomous operation by checking contract addresses.
